00023 #ifndef _CTK_SPU_TASK_H
00024 #define _CTK_SPU_TASK_H

00026 #if defined(UNIT_TEST) || defined(_CTKLIB)
00027 # include "ctk_spu_task_syscalls.h"
00028 #else
00029 # include "ctk/spu/ctk_spu_task_syscalls.h"
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033 extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #ifdef __SPU__
00037 
00038 /* Forbid to call _exit */
00039 static void __ctk_task_exit() __attribute__((destructor));
00040 static void __ctk_task_exit() {
00041     ctk_task_exit(0);
00042 }
00043 
00050 int ctk_task_main(unsigned long long id, unsigned long long arg1, unsigned long long arg2) /*__attribute__((flatten, always_inline))*/;
00051 
00052 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053  * XXX: we should be in a .c file
00054  */
00055 int main(unsigned long long arg1, unsigned long long arg2, unsigned long long arg3)
00056 {
00057     int id = ctk_task_init_env(arg1);
00058     int ret = ctk_task_main((unsigned long long)id, arg2, arg3);
00059     return ctk_task_exit(ret);
00060 }
00061 
00062 #define ctk_task_exit(ret)      return ctk_task_exit(ret);
00063 
00064 #endif /* __SPU__ */
00065 
00066 #ifdef __cplusplus
00067 };
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 #endif /* _CTK_SPU_TASK_H */
